name: Jenkins testing of Galaxy Tools
tagline: Jenkins scripts for testing Galaxy tool repos
body:
# Testing Galaxy tool repositories with Jenkins

1. Install [GitHub PR Builder Plugin](https://wiki.jenkins-ci.org/display/JENKINS/GitHub+pull+request+builder+plugin) (or whatever is appropriate to your code hosting solution)
2. Once you've done that, create a new project and point it at your GH Repo
3. Ensure that "Branch Specifier" is left blank.
4. Paste [test-repo.sh](test-repo.sh) in an execute-shell comamnd during the build phase
5. Publish JUnit reports from `reports/*.xml`
6. Publish HTML reports from `${WORKSPACE}/reports/${BUILD_NUMBER}/`, `index.html`
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
